title: 神奇女俠漫畫歷史性首次成為美漫月度銷量第一

replies.msg:
2020年1月的美漫月度銷量榜，神奇女俠Wonder Woman的漫畫在美漫歷史上首次成為銷量第一


為紀念神奇女俠漫畫多年來總期數達到750期，DC將在1月出版的Wonder Woman期數號碼變回750期
集合了DC眾多作者與畫家，並提供多個封面的紀念刊Wonder Woman #750不論在銷售量與銷售額都排首位
神奇女俠漫畫長久以來在DC的銷售量中只屬於中型份子，雖然與超人蝙蝠俠成為DC三巨頭，但是銷售量都遠不及兩人


資料來源：
https://www.comichron.com/monthlycomicssales/2020/2020-01.html
The new decade started off with something that had never happened before in the history of comics: an issue of Wonder Woman outsold all other comics in the month. Wonder Woman #750 followed in the footsteps of DC's previous giant-sized 80th anniversary issues Action Comics #1000 and Detective Comics #1000 and led all other comics in the month in both unit and dollar sales.

Wonder Woman was historically a middling-seller for DC, with only George Pérez's 1986 relaunch, seen at right, coming close to leading the market. (It placed eighth.) Its anniversary issue didn't approach the stratospheric sales levels of Action and Detective, but its 167,377 North American copies were enough to more than double the dollar sales of any other item in January.

掌舵DC十多年既Dan Didio今日終於收皮！
據悉世界各地既dc fans得知消息後都大開香檳慶祝

https://www.bleedingcool.com/2020/02/21/scoop-dan-didio-no-longer-publisher-of-dc-comics/
Whether he was quit, fired, or pushed out, we don't yet know. We may never know. But Bleeding Cool can confirm that Dan DiDio, publisher of DC Comics is no longer publisher of DC Comics. He is gone from the company, as of today. Whatever happened, happened fast.
終於收成正果

replies.msg: too latethe damage has been done

https://www.bleedingcool.com/2020/02/23/jim-lee-awakens-from-4-day-nap-to-learn-hes-suddenly-in-charge-of-dc-comics/?utm_source=dlvr.it&utm_medium=facebook
BC瘋狂抽水
Who could have dreamed that he would wake up one morning to find he actually had to manage the day-to-day operations of a major comic book company?

Bleeding Cool reached out to Dan Didio for comment by phone, but all we could hear was the sound of a shirtless, bald-headed man sipping frozen alcoholic beverages out of a coconut with a tiny umbrella while seagulls cooed in the background.

At press time, nobody at DC Comics' Burbank headquarters had been able to locate Geoff Johns, who sources tell us is currently hiding in a janitorial closet on the twelfth floor. We'll keep you updated on this situation as it develops.

痴線

BC整合左所有5G既報導
https://www.bleedingcool.com/2020/02/25/what-is-dc-comics-5g/

而Dan雖然被炒，5G都會繼續
因為WB先係5G背後最大推手
https://www.bleedingcool.com/2020/02/25/att-and-warner-bros-the-real-driving-force-behind-dc-comics-5g/

Because AT&T/Warner Bros are very, very serious about this 5G thing – not just for the comics, but this is also where they see the future of Warner Bros films and TV going as currently-established actors age up.
吓
